relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's SSE & SASE Platform
relatedBlades.subtitle: Stronger security and consistent experiences for your remote and office users alike
relatedBlades.copy:
- Provide simple, secure access for any user, app, device, network, or location
- Consolidate point products with an Internet-native architecture and one unified, composable platform
relatedBlades.leftLink: [Ready to talk to an expert? Click here to get in touch.](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/plans/enterprise/)

features.title: Simple, flexible architecture
features.description: Fast-track your journey to secure any-to-any connectivity. Cloudflare uniformly connects and secures end-to-end using one network and control plane.

features.title: Trusted, secure connectivity
features.description: Ensure reliable and scalable network connectivity with consistent protection from any location. Deliver [Zero Trust](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-zero-trust/) for your business using the same Cloudflare proxies that route ~20% of all websites.

features.title: Faster, future-proof innovation
features.description: Stay ahead of modern business needs to secure your future. Cloudflare is known to build and ship quickly, achieving rapid, native adoption of new Internet and security standards.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare recognized over 60x  by leading analysts
Modernize security and transform your network
relatedBlades.description: Ensure all traffic in and out of your business is verified and authorized. Check dynamic context to "never trust and always verify" every request.

columnContent.title: Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
columnContent.description: Enforce default-deny, Zero Trust rules for users accessing all your applications, faster and safer than a VPN.

columnContent.title: Secure Web Gateway (SWG)
columnContent.description: Secure and inspect corporate Internet traffic to help prevent phishing, ransomware, and other Internet risks.

columnContent.title: Remote Browser Isolation (RBI)
columnContent.description: Provide Internet threat and data protection by running code away from endpoints, without sacrificing performance.

columnContent.title: Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB)
columnContent.description: Easily secure SaaS tools, granularly control user access, and protect sensitive data.

columnContent.title: Cloud Email Security
columnContent.description: Preemptively protect your users from phishing, business email compromise (BEC), and email supply chain attacks.

columnContent.title: Data Loss Prevention (DLP)
columnContent.description: Inspect HTTP/S traffic for sensitive data like PII and prevent exfiltration with allow or block policies.

columnContent.title: Magic WAN
columnContent.description: Connect and secure your branch offices, headquarters, data centers, cloud VPCs and SD-WANs using the Cloudflare network.

columnContent.title: Magic Firewall
columnContent.description: Enforce consistent network security policies across your entire WAN, without backhauling traffic or creating choke points.

iconAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Firewall as a Service - Magic Firewall
iconAssetFile.title: Firewall as a service icon

relatedBlades.title: Helping organizations worldwide progress towards Zero Trust

plansList.description: Essential security controls to keep employees and apps protected online. Best for teams under 50 users, or proof-of-concept test runs.

features.title: Community forums available for tips and troubleshooting
Up to 24 hours of activity logging
Up to 3 network locations (for office-based DNS filtering)

plansList.description: Protects access to anything on your network and the Internet. Best for teams over 50 users that do not require enterprise support services.

features.title: No user limit with 100% uptime SLA
Email and chat with 4 hour median initial response for urgent issues
Up to 30 days of activity logging
Up to 20 network locations (for office-based DNS filtering)
Remote Browser Isolation (available as add-on for $10 per user)

plansList.description: Best for organizations that want security transformation backed by maximum support, visibility, connectivity and interoperability.

features.title: No user limit with 100% uptime SLA
Priority phone, email, & chat with 1 hour median initial response for urgent issues
Up to 6 months of activity logging
Up to 250 network locations (for office-based DNS filtering)
Multi-mode Cloud Access Security Broker (available as add-on)
